text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Director of Development for Athletics College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: Assist with efforts to significantly increase the level of philanthropic support for our University Athletics from private donors through the development of a comprehensive major, annual and...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
